id.description: Unique block identifier such as b1, b2, fig1.

text.description: Primary text content (may be summary for tables/figures).

caption.description: Optional caption extracted from PDF or produced by LLM.

key_points.description: LLM-generated list of key points or findings.

image_path.description: Filesystem path to extracted image artifact (if any).

table_cells.description: Optional 2D array of table cell values.

page.description: 1-indexed page number where this block is located.

bbox.description: Bounding box [x1,y1,x2,y2] in PDF coordinate space.
